body:
Dear advices team,

I wanted today to join your server. But i discovered im banned, it says that i was advertising?
I believe that this is an BIG problem!
I wasn't joined on the moment that I've been banned. It can maybe be my little brother, or i am hacked. But please, please urban me.

title: !!WHY!!

replies.body:
Please E-Mail support@avicus.net to appeal your Ban.

Forums aren't the place for this.

Good Luck! :D
